casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jason Ray WADE. No. 29P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Raleigh, for Wade. Isaac T. Avery, III, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.CApp. ___, 589 S.E.2d 379 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th day of January 2004 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
